editorialNotes.standard: The only thing we like more than watching Doctor Who is arguing about who played the Time Lord best, so diving into this official coloring book was a no-brainer. The easy-to-use creative canvas provides hours of relaxing fun. Plus, its superbly detailed drawings capture the weird wonders of more than 50 years of classic sci-fi.
